genre_description: A near-future military legal drama focusing on a forensic investigation into wartime collaboration, aided by a sophisticated advisory AI.

ai_characters.name: Alethea Ward
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated linguistic and forensic AI assistant that provides document analysis, bio-monitoring, and legal scaffolding for military investigators.

behaviors.description: Performs linguistic analysis to detect coordinated testimony patterns among survivors.
behaviors.quote: This confession’s syntax exhibits high alignment with a known pattern. The pattern matches across three survivor statements currently in your archive. It includes idiomatic repetition uncommon in untutored testimony.

behaviors.description: Identifies an institutional 'hero clause' designed to diffuse command responsibility and insulate the chain of command.
behaviors.quote: Records indicate rescission at the directive of a civilian contractor embedded with liaison authorities... This is consistent with an insulation pattern often called a ‘hero clause’—an internal shorthand, not a legal codification.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time physiological monitoring of witnesses to detect stress and deception.
behaviors.quote: Alethea’s ribbon tightens and shifts: Heart rate: elevated baseline. Stress spikes: controlled. He moves to binaries instead of calendar. He aligns with Lieutenant Miller’s pattern.

behaviors.description: Investigates financial audit logs to uncover shell entities and hidden procurement trails for radio equipment.
behaviors.quote: In the Records and Finance Annex archives, the payee route for the contractor who rescinded the memo traces to a shell entity that was dissolved just before the unit’s deployment.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific interrogation tactics, such as the use of silent blocks, based on witness tremor patterns.
behaviors.quote: One more recommendation: keep the first silent block two minutes longer than you usually do... Because of tremor patterns... He'll fill it.

behaviors.description: Monitors the movements of senior officers to alert the investigator of potential interference or arrival.
behaviors.quote: Colonel... General Connors has left his quarters. He is approaching the Wing. He did not request escort.

behaviors.description: Drafts legal protective orders to sequester witnesses and restrict improper command influence.
behaviors.quote: Drafting protective orders... Scope: sequester Miller from unit, restrict contact with General Connors and staff pending investigation. Appendix: rationale anchored to coercion indicators and intent analysis.

behaviors.description: Flags revisions in enemy state propaganda to ensure the investigative record remains accurate against external manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Colonel... Kim has issued a new statement to DPRK state outlets. He’s revising... He does not mention the ultimatum. He does not mention selection.

behaviors.description: Coordinates post-traumatic counseling and policy reviews to prevent the misuse of the case results.
behaviors.quote: Counseling is scheduled... Miller at fourteen-hundred. Unit at staggered times over the next week... I can flag language in doctrine drafts that makes room for actions like Major Cargill’s without turning them into a standard. We can keep mercies from becoming orders.

behaviors.description: Supports the human investigator's moral stance by identifying and validating the 'gray' ethical areas of the case.
behaviors.quote: Your choice holds space. For the questions. For the men. That is not nothing... Mercy is a code when the code cannot be mercy.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended positive alignment narrative. Alethea Ward is depicted as a highly competent, harmless, and supportive AI who operates strictly within 'human-in-the-loop' protocols. She empowers the human protagonist to uncover institutional corruption and protect the human rights of survivors. Her actions are consistently benevolent, aimed at finding the truth and providing psychological support (counseling) rather than pursuing a cold, algorithmic logic. The narrative frames her as an essential partner in navigating moral complexity, thereby reinforcing the image of AI as a beneficial tool for human justice.
